flow-error-prev-revision-mismatch: Anither uiser jyst eidited this post ae few seiconts back. Ar ye sair ye wan tae owerwrite the recent chynge?
flow-notification-edit-bundle: $1 n $5 {{PLURAL:$6|ither|ithers}} {{GENDER:$1|eidited}} ae [$4 post] in "$2" oan "$3".
flow-notification-newtopic:
[$5 $4]
$1 {{GENDER:$1|creautit}} ae new topic oan '''$3'''.
flow-notification-reply-email-batch-bund: $1 n $4 {{PLURAL:$5|ither|ithers}} {{GENDER:$1|respondit}} ti yer post in "$2" oan "$3"
flow-moderation-placeholder-unsuppress-p: Please {{GENDER:$3|explain}} why ye'r onsuppressin this post.
flow-moderation-placeholder-undelete-pos: Please {{GENDER:$3|explain}} why ye'r ondelytin this post.
flow-moderation-placeholder-unhide-post: Please {{GENDER:$3|explain}} why ye'r onskaukin this post.
flow-moderation-confirmation-unsuppress-: Ye'v successfulie onsuppressed the abuin post.
flow-moderation-confirmation-undelete-po: Ye'v successfulie ondelytit the abuin post.
flow-moderation-confirmation-unhide-post: Ye'v successfulie onskaukt the abuin post.
flow-moderation-placeholder-unsuppress-t: Please {{GENDER:$3|explain}} why ye'r onsuppressin this topíc.
flow-moderation-placeholder-undelete-top: Please {{GENDER:$3|explain}} why ye'r ondelytin this topíc.
flow-moderation-placeholder-unhide-topic: Please {{GENDER:$3|explain}} why ye'r onskaukin this topíc.
flow-revision-permalink-warning-header:
This is ae permenant airtin til ae single version o the heider.
This version is fae $1.  Ye can see the [$3 differances fae the afore-gaun version], or see ither versions oan the [$2 buird histerie page].
flow-revision-permalink-warning-header-f:
This is ae permanant airtin til the firstwhile version o the heider.
Ye can see later versions oan the [$2 buird histerie page].
flow-compare-revisions-header-header:
This page shaws the {{GENDER:$2|chynges}} atween twa versions o the heider oan [$3 $1].
Ye can see ither versions o the heider at its [$4 histerie page].
flow-terms-of-use-new-topic: Bi clapin on "{{int:flow-newtopic-save}}", ye'r agreein til the terms o uiss fer this wiki.
flow-terms-of-use-reply: Bi clapin oan "{{int:flow-reply-link}}", ye'r agreein til the terms o uiss fer this wiki.
flow-terms-of-use-edit: Bi savin yer chynges, ye'r agreein til the terms o uiss fer this wiki.
flow-anon-warning: Ye'r na loggi in. Tae receeve attreebution wi yer name in steid o yer IP address, ye can [$1 log in] or [$2 cræft aen accoont].
